attributes.action: urge the Civil Aviation Authority to relax restrictions on the flying of historically important ex-military jets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an effort to retain the important historical role  of Britains proud military jet aircraft throughout the years for future generations,we propose that it is vital that these aircraft must be seen where they belong in the skies above British airshows.Aircraft such as the English Electric Lightning and the many other types of the last 60 years should not be  confined to the ground and be seen in their natural enviroment to preserve Britains aviation heritage in all its glory.
